purpleculture_pinyin:
fèi
to abolish; to abandon; to abrogate; to discard; to depose; to oust; crippled; abandoned; waste
отменить; отказаться; аннулировать; отказаться; низложить; вытеснить; искалечен; заброшенный; напрасно тратить
rtega_mnemonic:
廢廢RS
废废		廃abrogate, terminate, discard, give up
  • place high on the hill 广 where what was shot or started 發/发/発 comes to an end: terminate
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 废)
Antonyms: 寶
Pictophonetic: 發 indicates the sound; 广 (house) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
廢物 [ fèi wù ]: rubbish; waste material; useless person
廢水 [ fèi shuǐ ]: waste water; drain water; effluent
廢除 [ fèi chú ]: to abolish; to abrogate; to repeal
廢止 [ fèi zhǐ ]: to repeal (a law); to put an end to; abolition; annulled
廢舊 [ fèi jiù ]: worn out; old-fashioned and dilapidated
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿸ Surround from upper left
    • 广 [ guǎng ] broad, vast, wide; building, house
    • 發 [ fā ] to issue, to dispatch, to send out; hair
heisig_chinese_memo: Companies send out so much junk mail that I don't have room in the trash and discard it in the cave.
Ru_trainchinese: fèi: (глаг/прил) отказываться от, бросать; свергать; непригодный, недействительный; искалеченный; удрученный
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The evil businessman sends a courier to discard all of the evidence of his white collar crimes at the bottom of a cave.
humanum_short_description_en: Inscriptions by " Fa " (with French words) as " waste ", against the clock: "Do not Fa (waste) I ordered." Said not to betray my orders. Qin bamboo slips also use " fa " as " waste ", "Sleeping Tiger Land Qin Slips. "Yu Shu": "It is the Dharma of the Law (abolished) Lord." See " Fa ".
humanum_short_description: 金文借「灋」(同法字)為「廢」，逆鐘：「勿灋(廢)朕命」。表示不要背棄我的命令。秦簡也借「法」為「廢」，《睡虎地秦簡．語書》：「是即法(廢)主之明法也。」，參見「法」。
_purpleculture_dictionary_orig_full:
廢 (Simplified: 废)
Pinyin: fèi
English Definition: to abolish; to abandon; to abrogate; to discard; to depose; to oust; crippled; abandoned; waste
Antonyms: 寶
Total strokes: 15; Radical: 广
Pictophonetic: 發 indicates the sound; 广 (house) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿸ Surround from upper left
    • 广 [ guǎng ] broad, vast, wide; building, house
    • 發 [ fā ] to issue, to dispatch, to send out; hair
Example Words:
廢物 [ fèi wù ]: rubbish; waste material; useless person
廢水 [ fèi shuǐ ]: waste water; drain water; effluent
廢除 [ fèi chú ]: to abolish; to abrogate; to repeal
廢止 [ fèi zhǐ ]: to repeal (a law); to put an end to; abolition; annulled
廢舊 [ fèi jiù ]: worn out; old-fashioned and dilapidated
More: 廢* | *廢 | *廢*

廢廢RS
废废 		廃 abrogate, terminate, discard, give up
  • place high on the hill 广 where what was shot or started 發/发/発 comes to an end: terminate
(Simplified: 废)
Chinese Definition: Antonyms: 寶
Pictophonetic: 發 indicates the sound; 广 (house) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿸ Surround from upper left
    • 广 [ guǎng ] broad, vast, wide; building, house
    • 發 [ fā ] to issue, to dispatch, to send out; hair
①停止，不再使用：廢弛(應該施行而不施行)。廢除。廢黜(罷免，革除)。廢帝(被廢黜的皇帝)。廢棄。廢止。廢置。因噎廢食。
②沒有用的，失去效用的：廢話。廢品。廢墟(受到破壞之後變成荒蕪的地方)。
③沒有用的東西：修舊利廢。利用“三廢”(“三廢”，廢氣、廢水、廢渣)。
④荒蕪，衰敗：田園荒廢。幾經興廢。
⑤重傷或殺死某人：廢了他。

廢字的基本解释

廢
fèi
见“废”。

廢字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fèi］
［《廣韻》方肺切，去廢，非。］
“废1”的繁体字。
(1)房屋倾圮无用。
(2)泛指倾圮，倒塌。
(3)荒芜；荒废。
(4)败坏，衰败。
(5)旷废，懈怠。
(6)抛弃；废弃。
(7)引申为多余无用。
(8)黜免；放逐。
(9)停止，中止。
(10)疲不能起或因伤残而失去作用。
(11)器物无足。
(12)坠，跌。
(13)偃伏。
(14)留置，放置。
(15)出卖。参见“廢居”。
(16)失望。参见“廢然”。
(17)大。形容程度深。
(18)大。夸大。
(19)杀，杀死。
(20)用同“费”。
(21)通“發”。精神焕发。
(22)通“發”。行，实施。

廢字的康熙字典解释

【寅集下】【广字部】　廢； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页351第02
【唐韻】方肺切【集韻】【韻會】放吠切，?音癈。【說文】屋頓也。　又【爾雅·釋詁】止也。【註】止住也。【禮·曲禮】凡祭有其廢之，莫敢舉也。有其舉之，莫敢廢也。　又【爾雅·釋詁】廢，舍也。【註】舍，放置。【周禮·天官·大宰】八柄，七曰廢，以馭其罪。【註】廢，猶放也。【又】八則，三曰廢置，以馭其吏。　又【爾雅·釋詁】大也。【詩·小雅】廢爲殘賦。【傳】廢，忲也。【釋文】一本作廢。大也。　又墮也。【左傳·定三年】邾子自投於牀，廢於爐炭。【註】廢，墮也。　又【轉註古音】音發。【前漢·郊祀歌】西顥沆碭。秋氣肅殺。含秀垂穎，續舊不廢。　又與癈通。【左傳·昭十四年】司徒老祁慮癸僞癈疾。　又與撥通。【周禮·冬官考工記·梓人】撥爾而怒。【註】故書撥作廢。鄭司農云：廢讀爲撥。

考證：〔【說文】屋傾也。〕　謹照原文傾改頓。〔【周禮·冬官考工記·梓人】必撥而怒。〕　謹按原文文義，必字可省，爾字不可省。謹改撥爾而怒。

Traditional characters of "废1".
(1) House dumping is useless.
(2) Refers to dumping, collapse.
(3) Barren; deserted.
(4) Corruption, decay.
(5) Deficiency and slackness.
(6) Abandon; discard.
(7) The extension is superfluous and useless.
(8) Exemption; exile.
(9) Stop, stop.
(10) Fatigue cannot take effect or lose its effect due to disability.
(11) The utensils are not sufficient.
(12) Fall, fall.
(13) Yan Fu.
(14) Retention and placement.
(15) Selling. See "abandoned residence".
(16) Disappointment. See "Abandoned Ran".
(17) Big. Describe the depth.
(18) Big. exaggerate.
(19) Kill, kill.
(20) Use the same "fee".
(21) Through "fat". Rejuvenated.
(22) Through "fat". OK, implement.
